name: Monsters with Anxiety
description:
Monsters With Anxiety is a platformer game that tasks players with helping an anxious monster friend named Monty find their way home in a world full of scarifying and monsterific obstacles and enemies.

Kudos to the team:

Dylan: Team Lead & Programmer

Taylor: Producer

Vinny: Lead Programmer & Lead Designer

Sangita: Lead Game Writer & Narrative Designer, Audio Designer

Kevin: Lead Artistic Director and Monster Wrangler

What I worked on

  • Programmed and implemented UI for anxiety bar, and menus
  • Designed and implemented a pause menu, gamover menu.
  • Wrote editor tools for level design
  • Programmed game mechanics and UI mechanics in C# in unity
  • Implemented a score system and collectible count.
  • Created build for publish
